entry.source: {F812}Strix\0{F87A,-455}{F813,0,46003}You don't like how those Luxuror{F801}bastards do things, no? Let's pick up{F801}where we left off and... Hm?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Strix\0{F87A,-455}{F813,0,46003}You don't like how those Luxuror{F801}bastards do things, no? Let's pick up{F801}where we left off and... Hm?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Strix\0{F87A,0}{F813,0,46004}Speak of the devil... I'll need to{F801}give us some privacy before we can{F801}chat!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Strix\0{F87A,0}{F813,0,46004}Speak of the devil... I'll need to{F801}give us some privacy before we can{F801}chat!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Man in tears\0{F87A,34}{F813,0,46005}I-I see... You became a Samurai,{F801}{F843,0}...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,46006}I had thought it strange not to see{F801}you in the village lately. I noticed{F801}your absence tonight, too...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Man in tears\0{F87A,34}{F813,0,46005}I-I see... You became a Samurai,{F801}{F843,0}...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,46006}I had thought it strange not to see{F801}you in the village lately. I noticed{F801}your absence tonight, too...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Man in tears\0{F87A,34}{F813,0,46008}There was a villager who brought back{F801}books from the castle town.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,46009}The younger ones of the village{F801}gathered in this forest and decided{F801}to hold a Sabbath.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Man in tears\0{F87A,34}{F813,0,46008}There was a villager who brought back{F801}books from the castle town.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,46009}The younger ones of the village{F801}gathered in this forest and decided{F801}to hold a Sabbath.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Man in tears\0{F87A,34}{F813,0,46010}...Really, of course, it was an excuse{F801}to denigrate the Luxurors. They chafed{F801}under the rules handed down...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,46011}It held little interest for me, so I{F801}decided to leave. That's when a number{F801}of them suddenly...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,46012}Th-They suddenly... Their bodies{F801}began to twist and warp...!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Man in tears\0{F87A,34}{F813,0,46010}...Really, of course, it was an excuse{F801}to denigrate the Luxurors. They chafed{F801}under the rules handed down...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,46011}It held little interest for me, so I{F801}decided to leave. That's when a number{F801}of them suddenly...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,46012}Th-They suddenly... Their bodies{F801}began to twist and warp...!{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The man's breathing grew more ragged...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The man's breathing grew more ragged...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F813,0,46013}...Thank you. You did well in telling{F801}us of this. Your part is finished here.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,46014}You should remove yourself to the{F801}forest entrance. The Samurai there{F801}will take you into their care.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F813,0,46013}...Thank you. You did well in telling{F801}us of this. Your part is finished here.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,46014}You should remove yourself to the{F801}forest entrance. The Samurai there{F801}will take you into their care.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The man walked away, wiping tears{F801}from his face.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The man walked away, wiping tears{F801}from his face.{F801}
